name: Go-ache
description:
Summer Game Jam 2017

In a world where you need to beat monsters with a paintbrush, you can switch with another character.

Dodging not only evades enemy attacks, as it helps switch characters in order to perform different attack specialties on enemies. Different attacks affect different enemy types.

Additionally, stamina is used up with dodging and attacks.

*Credits*

Programmer, UI Developer, Creative Lead, Director - Christopher "Chris" Hammer

Main character artist (model, texture, rig, and animation) - Natalia "Tulie" Mitiuriev

Villains were used from Epic Games' free "Infinity Blade" assets
